senses.sense_definition: A person who courts or seeks the affection of someone, typically with the intention of marriage.

examples.text: The wealthy heiress rejected every <w>wooer</w> who came to her door, waiting for true love instead.
He proved to be a persistent <w>wooer</w>, sending her poetry and flowers every week.

traits.comment: less common in modern conversation than 'suitor' or 'admirer'
